item.title: Header
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
• Home
Start Free Trial

item.title: FAQ
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Home/FAQ

FAQ

FAQ

We're here to help

Got questions? Weve got answers. Explore common queries about our platform, pricing, features, and support. Ask Questions

General Questions

What is included in the free trial? Our free trial gives you access to core AI tools, dashboards, and limited usage so you can explore the platform before upgrading. Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan anytime? Yes, you can switch plans anytime through your dashboard. Upgrades take effect immediately; downgrades at the end of your billing cycle. Do I need coding skills to use the platform? Not at all. Our no-code/low-code interface is built for both technical and non-technical users. Is my data secure with your platform? Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption, regular security audits, and comply with standards like GDPR and HIPAA. Can I integrate your tools with my existing software? Yes. Our platform supports API integrations with popular CRMs, ERPs, marketing tools, and more.

Popular Questions

What is included in the free trial?

Our free trial gives you access to core AI tools, dashboards, and limited usage so you can explore the platform before upgrading.

Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan anytime?

Yes, you can switch plans anytime through your dashboard. Upgrades take effect immediately; downgrades at the end of your billing cycle.

Do I need coding skills to use the platform?

Not at all. Our no-code/low-code interface is built for both technical and non-technical users.

Is my data secure with your platform?

Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption, regular security audits, and comply with standards like GDPR and HIPAA.

Can I integrate your tools with my existing software?

Yes. Our platform supports API integrations with popular CRMs, ERPs, marketing tools, and more.

item.title: Pricing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Home/Pricing

Pricing

Pricing

Smart Pricing for Smarter Solutions

Transparent, value-driven pricing for modern AI tools.

Starter Plan

$29.9/Month

Perfect for individuals & small teams getting started with AI.

Including:

  • Access to core AI tools
  • Basic analytics dashboard
  • Email support
  • Up to 2 team members
Select Plan

Popular

Growth Plan

$59.9/Month

For growing businesses ready to scale their AI capabilities.

Including:

  • Everything in Starter, plus:
  • Advanced automation workflows
  • Customizable dashboards
  • API access
  • Email support
  • Up to 10 team members
Select Plan

Enterprise Plan

$129.9/Month

Tailored AI solutions for large-scale operations.

Including:

  • All Pro features included
  • Dedicated account management
  • AI model training with your own data
  • Priority support
  • Custom SLA & deployment
  • On-premise or private cloud support
  • Unlimited team members
Select Plan

Testimonials

What Our Clients Are Saying

See how our AI tools have delivered measurable impact across industries. All Review

"Since integrating this AI platform, weve automated over 60% of our manual tasks. Its not just a toolits become a core part of our daily operations."

    Sarah Lim

    Operations Manager

    "We tried multiple solutions, but nothing matched the simplicity and speed of this one. The low-code interface made it easy for our entire team to get onboard fast."

      James Ortega

      CTO, Nova Analytics

      "As a growing tech startup, we needed something that could scale. Their support team is responsive, and the Enterprise plan fits perfectly as we expand."

        Lena Chow

        CEO, Digital Spark Inc.

        "We loved how the AI model could be trained on our own data. It feels personalized and understands our business better than most human consultants."

          Michael Tran

          Marketing Director

item.title: Services
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Home/Services

Services

Services

Powerful AI Services Tailored to You

Powering your digital transformation with intelligent solutions.

Automated AI - Data Analysis

Leverage artificial intelligence to collect, analyze, and visualize data trends, helping businesses make smarter, faster decisions.

Learn More

Intelligent Customer Support

Enhance customer experiences with smart chatbots and virtual assistants. Deliver instant, 24/7 support

Learn More

Predictive Maintenance Solutions

Prevent failures before they happen using AI-driven monitoring tools. Track machine health, predict breakdowns, and reduce downtime

Learn More

Features

Smart Tools to Drive Your Digital Growth

Our feature set adapts to your needs securely and efficiently.

Smart Automation

Automatically handles repetitive tasks to save time and reduce errors.

Real-Time Analytics

Gives instant insights from your data to help make better decisions fast.

Scalable Cloud Solutions

Easily grow your tools and storage as your business growsno extra hardware needed.

AI-Powered Chatbots

Answer customer questions 24/7 using intelligent virtual assistants.

Data Security & Privacy

Protects your business data with top-level encryption and compliance features.

Customizable Dashboards

Create your own visual dashboard to track what matters most to your team.

Easy Integration

Works smoothly with tools you already use, like CRM, marketing, or e-commerce apps.

More Features Coming Soon

Pricing

Smart Pricing for Smarter Solutions

Transparent, value-driven pricing for modern AI tools.

Starter Plan

$29.9/Month

Perfect for individuals & small teams getting started with AI.

Including:

  • Access to core AI tools
  • Basic analytics dashboard
  • Email support
  • Up to 2 team members
Select Plan

Popular

Growth Plan

$59.9/Month

For growing businesses ready to scale their AI capabilities.

Including:

  • Everything in Starter, plus:
  • Advanced automation workflows
  • Customizable dashboards
  • API access
  • Email support
  • Up to 10 team members
Select Plan

Enterprise Plan

$129.9/Month

Tailored AI solutions for large-scale operations.

Including:

  • All Pro features included
  • Dedicated account management
  • AI model training with your own data
  • Priority support
  • Custom SLA & deployment
  • On-premise or private cloud support
  • Unlimited team members
Select Plan

Testimonials

What Our Clients Are Saying

See how our AI tools have delivered measurable impact across industries. All Review

"Since integrating this AI platform, weve automated over 60% of our manual tasks. Its not just a toolits become a core part of our daily operations."

    Sarah Lim

    Operations Manager

    "We tried multiple solutions, but nothing matched the simplicity and speed of this one. The low-code interface made it easy for our entire team to get onboard fast."

      James Ortega

      CTO, Nova Analytics

      "As a growing tech startup, we needed something that could scale. Their support team is responsive, and the Enterprise plan fits perfectly as we expand."

        Lena Chow

        CEO, Digital Spark Inc.

        "We loved how the AI model could be trained on our own data. It feels personalized and understands our business better than most human consultants."

          Michael Tran

          Marketing Director

item.title: Testimonials
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Home/Testimonials

Testimonials

Testimonials

What Our Clients Are Saying

See how our AI tools have delivered measurable impact across industries.

"Since integrating this AI platform, weve automated over 60% of our manual tasks. Its not just a toolits become a core part of our daily operations."

    Sarah Lim

    Operations Manager

    "We tried multiple solutions, but nothing matched the simplicity and speed of this one. The low-code interface made it easy for our entire team to get onboard fast."

      James Ortega

      CTO, Nova Analytics

      "As a growing tech startup, we needed something that could scale. Their support team is responsive, and the Enterprise plan fits perfectly as we expand."

        Lena Chow

        CEO, Digital Spark Inc.

        "We loved how the AI model could be trained on our own data. It feels personalized and understands our business better than most human consultants."

          Michael Tran

          Marketing Director

          The setup was smooth, and their support team was always there when we needed them. We were live in just days not weeks.

            Sara Veldt

            Product Manager

            Within the first month, our ROI was already visible. The AI automation tools saved hours of manual work every week.

              David Lin

              CEO, StratNova

              Their AI analytics transformed how we understand our users. The data is not just numbers its actionable insights.

                Lydia Tran

                CMO, BrightEdge Digital

                We used the AI SaaS platform to optimize our ad campaigns. Conversions increased by 30% and cost-per-click.

                  Ravi Kumar

                  Project Lead

item.content:encoded:
Home/About

About

Our Story

AI-powered SaaS solutions are revolutionizing the way businesses by providing intelligent automation, data-driven insights, and seamless cloud integration. From optimizing workflows and enhancing customer.

Our portfoliocraft

To empower businesses worldwide through intelligent, scalable, and human-centered AI solutions.

Our Mission

Deliver cutting-edge AI tools that solve real-world business problems with simplicity and precision. Learn More 0 %

Reliable performance

Consistent, dependable operation ensuring smooth performance. 0 M

Projects completed

0 +

Intuitive design

Serving users globally with accessible and reliable solutions worldwide.

Our Team

Experts in Tech, Leaders in Transformation

We are engineers, product thinkers, data scientists, and creatives

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
New

New Introducing Nurox 2.0

Transform Your Business With Smarter Tech

Empower your team with AI-driven tools that automate workflows, analyze data, and drive smarter decisionsfaster than ever. Get Started Learn More

Transform

Unlocking the Power of AI Innovation

Powering your digital transformation with intelligent solutions.

Custom AI Solutions

Build intelligent systems that are specifically designed to solve your business challengesefficient, scalable, and made just for you.

Seamless AI Integration

Easily connect AI into your current tools, apps, and workflowsno technical headaches, just powerful automation.

Scale Your Business Smarter

Use AI to uncover new opportunities, optimize operations, and make smarter decisions that drive your business forward.

About us

AI-powered SaaS solutions are revolutionizing the way businesses by providing intelligent automation, data-driven insights, and seamless cloud integration. From optimizing workflows and enhancing customer.

Learn More 0 %

Reliable performance

Consistent, dependable operation ensuring smooth performance. 0 M

Projects completed

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consec tetur Cursus purus parturient.

Help desk ticketing system

0 +

Intuitive design

Serving users globally with accessible and reliable solutions worldwide.

Services

Powerful AI Services Tailored to You

Powering your digital transformation with intelligent solutions.

Automated AI - Data Analysis

Leverage artificial intelligence to collect, analyze, and visualize data trends, helping businesses make smarter, faster decisions.

Learn More

Intelligent Customer Support

Enhance customer experiences with smart chatbots and virtual assistants. Deliver instant, 24/7 support

Learn More

Predictive Maintenance Solutions

Prevent failures before they happen using AI-driven monitoring tools. Track machine health, predict breakdowns, and reduce downtime

Learn More

Features

Smart Tools to Drive Your Digital Growth

Our feature set adapts to your needs securely and efficiently.

Smart Automation

Automatically handles repetitive tasks to save time and reduce errors.

Real-Time Analytics

Gives instant insights from your data to help make better decisions fast.

Scalable Cloud Solutions

Easily grow your tools and storage as your business growsno extra hardware needed.

AI-Powered Chatbots

Answer customer questions 24/7 using intelligent virtual assistants.

Data Security & Privacy

Protects your business data with top-level encryption and compliance features.

Customizable Dashboards

Create your own visual dashboard to track what matters most to your team.

Easy Integration

Works smoothly with tools you already use, like CRM, marketing, or e-commerce apps.

More Features Coming Soon

Pricing

Smart Pricing for Smarter Solutions

Transparent, value-driven pricing for modern AI tools.

Starter Plan

$29.9/Month

Perfect for individuals & small teams getting started with AI.

Including:

  • Access to core AI tools
  • Basic analytics dashboard
  • Email support
  • Up to 2 team members
Select Plan

Popular

Growth Plan

$59.9/Month

For growing businesses ready to scale their AI capabilities.

Including:

  • Everything in Starter, plus:
  • Advanced automation workflows
  • Customizable dashboards
  • API access
  • Email support
  • Up to 10 team members
Select Plan

Enterprise Plan

$129.9/Month

Tailored AI solutions for large-scale operations.

Including:

  • All Pro features included
  • Dedicated account management
  • AI model training with your own data
  • Priority support
  • Custom SLA & deployment
  • On-premise or private cloud support
  • Unlimited team members
Select Plan

Testimonials

What Our Clients Are Saying

See how our AI tools have delivered measurable impact across industries. All Review

"Since integrating this AI platform, weve automated over 60% of our manual tasks. Its not just a toolits become a core part of our daily operations."

    Sarah Lim

    Operations Manager

    "We tried multiple solutions, but nothing matched the simplicity and speed of this one. The low-code interface made it easy for our entire team to get onboard fast."

      James Ortega

      CTO, Nova Analytics

      "As a growing tech startup, we needed something that could scale. Their support team is responsive, and the Enterprise plan fits perfectly as we expand."

        Lena Chow

        CEO, Digital Spark Inc.

        "We loved how the AI model could be trained on our own data. It feels personalized and understands our business better than most human consultants."

          Michael Tran

          Marketing Director

          FAQ

          We're here to help

          Got questions? Weve got answers. Explore common queries about our platform, pricing, features, and support. Ask Questions What is included in the free trial? Our free trial gives you access to core AI tools, dashboards, and limited usage so you can explore the platform before upgrading. Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan anytime? Yes, you can switch plans anytime through your dashboard. Upgrades take effect immediately; downgrades at the end of your billing cycle. Do I need coding skills to use the platform? Not at all. Our no-code/low-code interface is built for both technical and non-technical users. Is my data secure with your platform? Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption, regular security audits, and comply with standards like GDPR and HIPAA. Can I integrate your tools with my existing software? Yes. Our platform supports API integrations with popular CRMs, ERPs, marketing tools, and more.

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: https://portfoliocraft.rakmyat.com.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
New

New Introducing Nurox 2.0

Transform Your Business With Smarter Tech

Empower your team with AI-driven tools that automate workflows, analyze data, and drive smarter decisionsfaster than ever. Get Started Learn More

Transform

Unlocking the Power of AI Innovation

Powering your digital transformation with intelligent solutions.

Custom AI Solutions

Build intelligent systems that are specifically designed to solve your business challengesefficient, scalable, and made just for you.

Seamless AI Integration

Easily connect AI into your current tools, apps, and workflowsno technical headaches, just powerful automation.

Scale Your Business Smarter

Use AI to uncover new opportunities, optimize operations, and make smarter decisions that drive your business forward.

About us

AI-powered SaaS solutions are revolutionizing the way businesses by providing intelligent automation, data-driven insights, and seamless cloud integration. From optimizing workflows and enhancing customer.

Learn More 0 %

Reliable performance

Consistent, dependable operation ensuring smooth performance. 0 M

Projects completed

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consec tetur Cursus purus parturient.

Help desk ticketing system

0 +

Intuitive design

Serving users globally with accessible and reliable solutions worldwide.

Services

Powerful AI Services Tailored to You

Powering your digital transformation with intelligent solutions.

Automated AI - Data Analysis

Leverage artificial intelligence to collect, analyze, and visualize data trends, helping businesses make smarter, faster decisions.

Learn More

Intelligent Customer Support

Enhance customer experiences with smart chatbots and virtual assistants. Deliver instant, 24/7 support

Learn More

Predictive Maintenance Solutions

Prevent failures before they happen using AI-driven monitoring tools. Track machine health, predict breakdowns, and reduce downtime

Learn More

Features

Smart Tools to Drive Your Digital Growth

Our feature set adapts to your needs securely and efficiently.

Smart Automation

Automatically handles repetitive tasks to save time and reduce errors.

Real-Time Analytics

Gives instant insights from your data to help make better decisions fast.

Scalable Cloud Solutions

Easily grow your tools and storage as your business growsno extra hardware needed.

AI-Powered Chatbots

Answer customer questions 24/7 using intelligent virtual assistants.

Data Security & Privacy

Protects your business data with top-level encryption and compliance features.

Customizable Dashboards

Create your own visual dashboard to track what matters most to your team.

Easy Integration

Works smoothly with tools you already use, like CRM, marketing, or e-commerce apps.

More Features Coming Soon

Pricing

Smart Pricing for Smarter Solutions

Transparent, value-driven pricing for modern AI tools.

Starter Plan

$29.9/Month

Perfect for individuals & small teams getting started with AI.

Including:

  • Access to core AI tools
  • Basic analytics dashboard
  • Email support
  • Up to 2 team members
Select Plan

Popular

Growth Plan

$59.9/Month

For growing businesses ready to scale their AI capabilities.

Including:

  • Everything in Starter, plus:
  • Advanced automation workflows
  • Customizable dashboards
  • API access
  • Email support
  • Up to 10 team members
Select Plan

Enterprise Plan

$129.9/Month

Tailored AI solutions for large-scale operations.

Including:

  • All Pro features included
  • Dedicated account management
  • AI model training with your own data
  • Priority support
  • Custom SLA & deployment
  • On-premise or private cloud support
  • Unlimited team members
Select Plan

Testimonials

What Our Clients Are Saying

See how our AI tools have delivered measurable impact across industries. All Review

"Since integrating this AI platform, weve automated over 60% of our manual tasks. Its not just a toolits become a core part of our daily operations."

    Sarah Lim

    Operations Manager

    "We tried multiple solutions, but nothing matched the simplicity and speed of this one. The low-code interface made it easy for our entire team to get onboard fast."

      James Ortega

      CTO, Nova Analytics

      "As a growing tech startup, we needed something that could scale. Their support team is responsive, and the Enterprise plan fits perfectly as we expand."

        Lena Chow

        CEO, Digital Spark Inc.

        "We loved how the AI model could be trained on our own data. It feels personalized and understands our business better than most human consultants."

          Michael Tran

          Marketing Director

          FAQ

          We're here to help

          Got questions? Weve got answers. Explore common queries about our platform, pricing, features, and support. Ask Questions What is included in the free trial? Our free trial gives you access to core AI tools, dashboards, and limited usage so you can explore the platform before upgrading. Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan anytime? Yes, you can switch plans anytime through your dashboard. Upgrades take effect immediately; downgrades at the end of your billing cycle. Do I need coding skills to use the platform? Not at all. Our no-code/low-code interface is built for both technical and non-technical users. Is my data secure with your platform? Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption, regular security audits, and comply with standards like GDPR and HIPAA. Can I integrate your tools with my existing software? Yes. Our platform supports API integrations with popular CRMs, ERPs, marketing tools, and more.

About

Our Story

AI-powered SaaS solutions are revolutionizing the way businesses by providing intelligent automation, data-driven insights, and seamless cloud integration. From optimizing workflows and enhancing customer.

Our portfoliocraft

To empower businesses worldwide through intelligent, scalable, and human-centered AI solutions.

Our Mission

Deliver cutting-edge AI tools that solve real-world business problems with simplicity and precision. Learn More 0 %

Reliable performance

Consistent, dependable operation ensuring smooth performance. 0 M

We are engineers, product thinkers, data scientists, and creatives

item.title: Testimonials
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Home/Testimonials

Testimonials

Testimonials

What Our Clients Are Saying

See how our AI tools have delivered measurable impact across industries.

"Since integrating this AI platform, weve automated over 60% of our manual tasks. Its not just a toolits become a core part of our daily operations."

    Sarah Lim

    Operations Manager

    "We tried multiple solutions, but nothing matched the simplicity and speed of this one. The low-code interface made it easy for our entire team to get onboard fast."

      James Ortega

      CTO, Nova Analytics

      "As a growing tech startup, we needed something that could scale. Their support team is responsive, and the Enterprise plan fits perfectly as we expand."

        Lena Chow

        CEO, Digital Spark Inc.

        "We loved how the AI model could be trained on our own data. It feels personalized and understands our business better than most human consultants."

          Michael Tran

          Marketing Director

          The setup was smooth, and their support team was always there when we needed them. We were live in just days not weeks.

            Sara Veldt

            Product Manager

            Within the first month, our ROI was already visible. The AI automation tools saved hours of manual work every week.

              David Lin

              CEO, StratNova

              Their AI analytics transformed how we understand our users. The data is not just numbers its actionable insights.

                Lydia Tran

                CMO, BrightEdge Digital

                We used the AI SaaS platform to optimize our ad campaigns. Conversions increased by 30% and cost-per-click.

                  Ravi Kumar

                  Project Lead

item.content:encoded:
Home/Contact

Contact

Contact us

Let's Get In Touch

Have a question, idea, or need help getting started? Our team is here to support you. Drop us a message wed love to hear from you!

Email:

nurox@support.com

Phone:

+0 (555) 123 45 67

Address:

Callison Laney Buoy Building W 13th Parks Suite 559, Denver

Follow Us:

Jki-facebook-f Jki-twitter Jki-youtube-v-light Jki-pinterest-p Jki-behance

item.title: FAQ
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Home/FAQ

FAQ

FAQ

We're here to help

Got questions? Weve got answers. Explore common queries about our platform, pricing, features, and support. Ask Questions

General Questions

What is included in the free trial? Our free trial gives you access to core AI tools, dashboards, and limited usage so you can explore the platform before upgrading. Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan anytime? Yes, you can switch plans anytime through your dashboard. Upgrades take effect immediately; downgrades at the end of your billing cycle. Do I need coding skills to use the platform? Not at all. Our no-code/low-code interface is built for both technical and non-technical users. Is my data secure with your platform? Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption, regular security audits, and comply with standards like GDPR and HIPAA. Can I integrate your tools with my existing software? Yes. Our platform supports API integrations with popular CRMs, ERPs, marketing tools, and more.

Popular Questions

What is included in the free trial?

Our free trial gives you access to core AI tools, dashboards, and limited usage so you can explore the platform before upgrading.

Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan anytime?

Yes, you can switch plans anytime through your dashboard. Upgrades take effect immediately; downgrades at the end of your billing cycle.

Do I need coding skills to use the platform?

Not at all. Our no-code/low-code interface is built for both technical and non-technical users.

Is my data secure with your platform?

Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption, regular security audits, and comply with standards like GDPR and HIPAA.

Can I integrate your tools with my existing software?

Yes. Our platform supports API integrations with popular CRMs, ERPs, marketing tools, and more.

item.title: Testimonials
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Home/Testimonials

Testimonials

Testimonials

What Our Clients Are Saying

See how our AI tools have delivered measurable impact across industries.

"Since integrating this AI platform, weve automated over 60% of our manual tasks. Its not just a toolits become a core part of our daily operations."

    Sarah Lim

    Operations Manager

    "We tried multiple solutions, but nothing matched the simplicity and speed of this one. The low-code interface made it easy for our entire team to get onboard fast."

      James Ortega

      CTO, Nova Analytics

      "As a growing tech startup, we needed something that could scale. Their support team is responsive, and the Enterprise plan fits perfectly as we expand."

        Lena Chow

        CEO, Digital Spark Inc.

        "We loved how the AI model could be trained on our own data. It feels personalized and understands our business better than most human consultants."

          Michael Tran

          Marketing Director

          The setup was smooth, and their support team was always there when we needed them. We were live in just days not weeks.

            Sara Veldt

            Product Manager

            Within the first month, our ROI was already visible. The AI automation tools saved hours of manual work every week.

              David Lin

              CEO, StratNova

              Their AI analytics transformed how we understand our users. The data is not just numbers its actionable insights.

                Lydia Tran

                CMO, BrightEdge Digital

                We used the AI SaaS platform to optimize our ad campaigns. Conversions increased by 30% and cost-per-click.

                  Ravi Kumar

                  Project Lead

Home/Team

Team

Our Team

Experts in Tech, Leaders in Transformation

We are engineers, product thinkers, data scientists, and creatives

item.title: Pricing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Home/Pricing

Pricing

Pricing

Smart Pricing for Smarter Solutions

Transparent, value-driven pricing for modern AI tools.

Starter Plan

$29.9/Month

Perfect for individuals & small teams getting started with AI.

Including:

  • Access to core AI tools
  • Basic analytics dashboard
  • Email support
  • Up to 2 team members
Select Plan

Popular

Growth Plan

$59.9/Month

For growing businesses ready to scale their AI capabilities.

Including:

  • Everything in Starter, plus:
  • Advanced automation workflows
  • Customizable dashboards
  • API access
  • Email support
  • Up to 10 team members
Select Plan

Enterprise Plan

$129.9/Month

Tailored AI solutions for large-scale operations.

Including:

  • All Pro features included
  • Dedicated account management
  • AI model training with your own data
  • Priority support
  • Custom SLA & deployment
  • On-premise or private cloud support
  • Unlimited team members
Select Plan

Testimonials

What Our Clients Are Saying

See how our AI tools have delivered measurable impact across industries. All Review

"Since integrating this AI platform, weve automated over 60% of our manual tasks. Its not just a toolits become a core part of our daily operations."

    Sarah Lim

    Operations Manager

    "We tried multiple solutions, but nothing matched the simplicity and speed of this one. The low-code interface made it easy for our entire team to get onboard fast."

      James Ortega

      CTO, Nova Analytics

      "As a growing tech startup, we needed something that could scale. Their support team is responsive, and the Enterprise plan fits perfectly as we expand."

        Lena Chow

        CEO, Digital Spark Inc.

        "We loved how the AI model could be trained on our own data. It feels personalized and understands our business better than most human consultants."

          Michael Tran

          Marketing Director

item.title: Services Archive
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Home/Services

Services

Services

Powerful AI Services Tailored to You

Powering your digital transformation with intelligent solutions.

Automated AI - Data Analysis

Leverage artificial intelligence to collect, analyze, and visualize data trends, helping businesses make smarter, faster decisions. Learn More

Intelligent Customer Support

Enhance customer experiences with smart chatbots and virtual assistants. Deliver instant, 24/7 support Learn More

Predictive Maintenance Solutions

Prevent failures before they happen using AI-driven monitoring tools. Track machine health, predict breakdowns, and reduce downtime Learn More

Features

Smart Tools to Drive Your Digital Growth

Our feature set adapts to your needs securely and efficiently.

Smart Automation

Automatically handles repetitive tasks to save time and reduce errors.

Real-Time Analytics

Gives instant insights from your data to help make better decisions fast.

Scalable Cloud Solutions

Easily grow your tools and storage as your business growsno extra hardware needed.

AI-Powered Chatbots

Answer customer questions 24/7 using intelligent virtual assistants.

Data Security & Privacy

Protects your business data with top-level encryption and compliance features.

Customizable Dashboards

Create your own visual dashboard to track what matters most to your team.

Easy Integration

Works smoothly with tools you already use, like CRM, marketing, or e-commerce apps.

More Features Coming Soon

Pricing

Smart Pricing for Smarter Solutions

Transparent, value-driven pricing for modern AI tools.

Starter Plan

$29.9/Month

Perfect for individuals & small teams getting started with AI.

Including:

  • Access to core AI tools
  • Basic analytics dashboard
  • Email support
  • Up to 2 team members

Growth Plan

$59.9/Month

For growing businesses ready to scale their AI capabilities.

Including:

  • Everything in Starter, plus:
  • Advanced automation workflows

  • Email support
  • Up to 10 team members

Enterprise Plan

$129.9/Month

Including:

  • All Pro features included

item.title: Single Services
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Home/Services Detail

Services Detail

Automated AI - Data Analysis

  • Data Collection
  • Algorithm Selection
  • Action
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipiscing elit. Quisque faucibus ex sapien vitae pellentesque sem placerat. In id cursus mi pretium tellus duis convallis. Tempus leo eu aenean sed diam urna tempor. Learn More

A comprehensive solution :

  • Smart Data Processing
  • AI-Powered Insights
  • Customizable Dashboards
  • Predictive & Prescriptive Analytics
  • Seamless Integration

FAQ

We're here to help

Got questions? Weve got answers. Explore common queries about our platform, pricing, features, and support. Ask Questions What is included in the free trial? Our free trial gives you access to core AI tools, dashboards, and limited usage so you can explore the platform before upgrading. Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan anytime? Yes, you can switch plans anytime through your dashboard. Upgrades take effect immediately; downgrades at the end of your billing cycle. Do I need coding skills to use the platform? Not at all. Our no-code/low-code interface is built for both technical and non-technical users. Is my data secure with your platform? Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption, regular security audits, and comply with standards like GDPR and HIPAA. Can I integrate your tools with my existing software? Yes. Our platform supports API integrations with popular CRMs, ERPs, marketing tools, and more.
